ghost

Class GhostObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • ghost.GameObject
      • ghost.MovingEntities
        • ghost.GhostObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ambusher, Chaser, Ignorant, Whim

    public abstract class GhostObject
extends MovingEntities
